title: Kyogo Furuhashi : Why Manchester City want Celtic star
body_text:
MICHAEL GRANT
Kyogo Furuhashi: Why Manchester City want Celtic star
Kyogo Furuhashi, the 5ft 7in striker with the mushroom mop of hair, has been an effervescent menace for Celtic but could he cut it as Erling Haalandâ€™s understudy?
